exam.question: Mr. Johnson preferred _______ heavier work to do.

answer.explain: 句意： 约翰逊先生宁可被分给更重的活干。prefer后面的动名词或动词不定式的动作主体就是句子的主语； give一般要求有双宾语， 而句子里并无give的间接宾语， 所以答案应当用被动语态。

sentences.sContent: On any given day in the Houston area, half the hospital beds are empty.
sentences.sCn: 在休斯敦地区，任何一天医院的床位都有一半是空的。

sentences.sContent: The rules are to be followed in any given situation.
sentences.sCn: 这些规则在任何情况下都要遵守。

sentences.sContent: ...And the quit rates were particularly convincing given that before the study started...
...instead of focusing on a given feature...
...Ben’s given up making those terrible faces he used to make...
...One had to quit abruptly on a given day...
...Each statement contains information given in one of the paragraphs...
...the situation has given my college son and me something to share...
...they saw a large chocolate cake and they each were given a slice...
...This may not be surprising given that this is the age range when women have children...

words.tran: 给；赠送（give的ing形式）；付出；产生
捐赠；面向；有弹性；气候转暖

trans.tranCn: 规定的，特定的；假设的；已知的；有癖好的，有倾向的
trans.tranOther: any particular time, situation, amount etc that is being used as an example
